caja-actions-new is a command-line utility for defining a new action;
caja-actions-schemas is a command-line utility which outputs to stdout the MateConf schemas of the Caja-Actions Configuration Tool; it rather targets packagers.
the &prodname; Reference Manual (this document) rather targets developers and packagers;

the &prodname; Configuration Tool User's Manual is the user's manual of the Caja-Actions Configuration Tool management user interface. The distribution contains all available translations, both as HTML and PDF documents.

listitem.para: The sample menus and actions described in the &prodname; Configuration Tool User's Manual are included in the standard distribution.
